TITLE: EpocketCash

DATE_ABUSED:
It is forbidden to use the application until the time on the device matches your local time. 
 Tune up the date and time settings on your device.
ROOT_ENABLED_ANDROID: or root privileges were obtained on the device.
ROOT_ENABLED_IOS: or Jailbreak was installed on the device.

INFO_PAGE.INFO_TITLE:
Do you want to spend your time profitably?
Visit stores at the mall using EPocketCash App.
While you’re shopping – discounts & bonuses are growing.
How it works?
Today, the shopping day! Open EPocketCash App, chose your favorite mall and go shopping. While you’re at the mall, we credit your account with bonuses. You can spend earned bonuses in the stores – EPocketCash participants or enjoy coffee.
Come up with your friends – earn more bonuses.
Play the quest of visiting, take a photo, make a post on your page. Get pleasure & benefit spending your time.
Download EPocketCash App, chose the place, where you’d like to be, and get bonuses just walking through the mall. You’ll be informed about discounts and promo actions firstly. You can exchange your time for gifts from stores – EPocketCash participants. You can earn bonuses for:
- your time, spent at the mall;
- visiting the stores at the mall;
- placing a photo on your page;
- inviting friends.
If you want to spend your time profitably, use our application every time you go shopping.
